Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Combine peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, sriracha, minced garlic, and grated ginger in a bowl.
Soak bamboo skewers in water for 15 minutes.
Brush tofu skewers with peanut sauce marinade.
Grill tofu skewers for 5-7 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
Serve with additional peanut sauce and garnish with green onions.
